api/CG.Configuration.ConfigurationExcept.title: Class ConfigurationException

Declaration public ConfigurationException(SerializationInfo info, StreamingContext context) Parameters Type Name Description System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo info The serialization info to use for the exception. System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext context The streaming context to use for the exception. api/Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.A.title: Class AppConfigConfigurationBuilderExtensions
api/Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.A.keywords: Class AppConfigConfigurationBuilderExtensions This class contains extension methods related to the Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfigurationBuilder type, for registering types related to configuration builders. Inheritance System.Object AppConfigConfigurationBuilderExtensions Inherited Members System.Object.Equals(System.Object) System.Object.Equals(System.Object, System.Object) System.Object.GetHashCode() System.Object.GetType() System.Object.MemberwiseClone() System.Object.ReferenceEquals(System.Object, System.Object) System.Object.ToString() Namespace : Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration Assembly : CG.Configuration.dll Syntax public static class AppConfigConfigurationBuilderExtensions Methods AddAppConfigSource(IConfigurationBuilder, Boolean, Boolean) This method injects an app.config source into the specified builder. Declaration public static IConfigurationSource AddAppConfigSource(this IConfigurationBuilder builder, bool optional = true, bool reloadOnChange = false) Parameters Type Name Description Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfigurationBuilder builder The builder to use for the operation. System.Boolean optional True if the file is optional; false otherwise. System.Boolean reloadOnChange True if the provider should reload the data from the underlying file changes; false otherwise. Returns Type Description Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfigurationSource An Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfigurationSource object.

SafeCopy<TObj, TProp>(IConfiguration, TObj, Expression<Func<TObj, TProp>>, String, Boolean) This method safely copies a value from the specified key of the configuration to the property on the target oject using a LINQ expression to identify the property to change. If the configuration key is missing, or the value is NULL, then no copy operation is performed - unless the allowSetNulls property is set to TRUE. Declaration public static IConfiguration SafeCopy<TObj, TProp>(this IConfiguration configuration, TObj target, Expression<Func<TObj, TProp>> selector, string key, bool allowSetNulls = false) where TObj : class Parameters Type Name Description Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration configuration The configuration to use for the operation. TObj target The target object to use for the operation. System.Linq.Expressions.Expression < System.Func <TObj, TProp>> selector The LINQ expression to use for the operation. System.String key The configuration key to use for the operation. System.Boolean allowSetNulls Indicates whether to allow a NULL value to be copied to the specified property on the target object. Returns Type Description Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration The value of the configuration parameter. Type Parameters Name Description TObj The target object type. api/Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.h.title: Namespace Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration
api/Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.h.keywords: Namespace Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration Classes AppConfigConfigurationBuilderExtensions This class contains extension methods related to the Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfigurationBuilder type, for registering types related to configuration builders. ConfigurationExtensions This class contains extension methods related to the Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration type, for registering types related to configurations.

index.html.title: Introduction
index.html.keywords: Introduction CG.Configuration.dll contains configuration extensions used by other CodeGator packages.
